content.query:
COPY INTO dbo.DailySalesCopyCommand
(StoredCode default '0000' 1, Date 2, TotalSales 3, TotalAmount 4)
from 'https://chalkilinkedin.blob.core.windows.net/sales/**'
WITH 
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY = 'Shared Acess Signiture',
    SECRET= '?sv=2021-04-10&st=2023-01-04T11%3A25%3A10Z&se=2023-03-31T10%3A25%3A00Z&sr=c&sp=rl&sig=iAU6%2Fhslmki4A6Ycx7K4XdoMV4aFSzXh7WLr%2FPcfaUE%3D',
    ENCODING = 'UTF-8',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    FIRSTROW=2
)
